CustomField.formula: External_Contact__r.Contact_Full_Name__c + '|01|' + External_Contact__r.FirstName + '|02|' + External_Contact__r.MiddleName + '|03|' + External_Contact__r.LastName + '|04|' + External_Contact__r.Title + '|05|' + External_Contact__r.Email + '|06|' + External_Contact__r.Phone + '|07|' + External_Contact__r.Account.Name
CustomField.label: Report External Contact Fields
